attributes.action: Remove Hazel Blears from Parliament with immediate effect and all labour members of parliament who have committed fraud.  Parliament must be returned to a place of morality and honesty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot allow petitions which contain party political material, such as references to political parties. This is also a matter for Gordon Brown as head of the Labour party, not as head of Government, and your concerns should be addressed to the Labour Party.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
